author: Syrex
description: Hoshimi Miyabi is a S rank character in Zenless Zone Zero, with Frost element and anomaly Attribute. She has been awarded the title of "Void Hunter: Isshin Muga"

weapons.name: Hailstorm Shrine
weapons.description: This is the best W engine for Hoshimi Miyabi.With 24% <cr> crit rate on main stats, 50% <cd> crit dmg and 40% <ice> ice dmg can make you build her easier.
weapons.title: Best W engine and only one, no replacement

four_pieces.name: Branch & Blade Song
four_pieces.description: This disk set just making for her. At 2pc gives 16% <cd> crit dmg can boost all the time and 12% <cr> crit rate on 4pc. Branch & Blade Song set can make you easily reach 80% <cr> crit rate to max her core

two_pieces.name: Hormone Punk / Puffer Electro
two_pieces.description: The difference for those set isnt big, choose which one u got best substats (like %atk, <ap> AP and crit)

two_pieces.name: Astral Voice / Polar Metal
two_pieces.description: Same as set above, just choose which one u got best substats

two_pieces.name: Woodpecker Electro
two_pieces.description: Same as set above, just choose which one u got best substats

main_stats.stat_priority: <atk> ATK = <am> AM (choose <am> AM if u got <m1)

stat.baseline_stats:
<atk> Atk: > 2700 - 3400 (1 <atk> atk disk slot)
<cr> Crit rate: 80% (<m2), 65-73 (m2+)
<cd> Crit dmg: 130-150
<ap> AP: < 300

extra_sections.title: Disorder gameplay
extra_sections.description: You can looking for Disk 4 <ap> AP if you got many <atk> atk% substats and doesnt got any <ap> AP rolls on ur build your team must be : soukaku and yuzuha to use <ap> AP on disk 4, if no just looking for <atk> atk% or crit.

mindscapes.description: With 36% ignore <def> Def% can increased your Dmg and with removing frostburn state at  the slash for charge level three of Basic Attack: Shimotsuki hits can make you trigger anomaly damage easier and more often, especially on disorder team

With more 15% <cr> crit rate makes you can reach 80% <cr> crit rate easier, at 5th attack can give 1 fallen frost and first combat gives 6 fallen frost, all for this can make miyabi less depending on anomaly teammate.

teams.name: Mono Ice Team
teams.description: F2p team for Hoshimi Miyabi, mainly aim for dealing many disorder as much as possible

teams.name: Fake mono Ice team
teams.description: An improving mono <ice> ice team, this team is easier to play thanks to yuzuha.
